sentences.en: He dressed very smartly which was important in those days.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠楚楚——这一点在那个时候很重要。

sentences.en: He stepped back smartly from the edge.
sentences.cn: 他敏捷地从边上退了回来.

sentences.en: He was a big man, smartly dressed in a suit and tie.
sentences.cn: 他身材高大，穿着西服打着领带，非常帅气。

sentences.en: He was smartly dressed in a shirt, dark trousers and boots.
sentences.cn: 他穿着衬衫和黑裤子，脚蹬皮靴，看上去很帅气。

sentences.en: He's usually smartly-dressed, I'll say that for him.
sentences.cn: 我能说的是，至少他通常穿着入时。

sentences.en: Her children are always smartly turned out.
sentences.cn: 她的小孩总是打扮得漂漂亮亮的.

sentences.en: Her little shoes now fitted her smartly and had high heels.
sentences.cn: 她的小脚上穿的是漂亮的高跟皮鞋.

sentences.en: Many years ago there lived an Emperor who laid so great a value upon new clothes that he spent all his money on them in order to be smartly dressed.
sentences.cn: 很久很久以前，有一位皇帝，他是如此的看重新衣服，以至于把他所有的钱都花在上面，以使得自己能穿得潇洒漂亮。
斯泰西干净利落地行了个礼。
卫兵向我行了个漂亮的军礼.

sentences.en: The housekeeper moved smartly to the Vicar's desk to answer the call.
sentences.cn: 管家迅速来到牧师的书桌前接电话。

sentences.en: The sailor went through all the motions smartly.
sentences.cn: 这个水手机灵地走了走过场。

sentences.en: The Sergeant threw the frayed sheaf of football-pool coupons aside and snatched the radio. He saluted smartly, his huge belly juggling like a water gourd.
sentences.cn: 警官将凌乱的足球彩票扔到一边抓起了对话机，他潇洒地敬了个礼，巨大的肚子晃得就像一个水葫芦。

sentences.en: The woman was smartly dressed and well-spoken.
sentences.cn: 那名女子穿着讲究，谈吐得体。

sentences.en: They were smartly but casually dressed; possibly students.
sentences.cn: 他们衣着时尚，但很休闲，也许是学生。

sentences.en: They were smartly but casually dressed.
sentences.cn: 他们穿得很漂亮，但又都很随意。

sentences.en: You can't just wear any clothes if you're going there — you have to dress very smartly.
sentences.cn: 如果你去那里,你不能穿着普普通通的衣服,你必须穿得很整齐漂亮.
